alert.note: Alert for Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:52AM EST until January 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wappingers Creek at Wappingers Falls. * WHEN...From this morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding and water begins to flood nearby homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 8.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Wappingers Creek Wappingers Falls Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Wed 3 am: 5.7 Forecast: Wed 7 am 7.0 Wed 1 pm 8.5 Wed 7 pm 8.7 Thu 1 am 8.6 Thu 7 am 8.3 Thu 1 pm 8.1 Thu 7 pm 7.6 Fri 1 am 6.7 Fri 7 am 5.9 &&
